name: @seven332/libheif-wasm
description: A WebAssembly implementation of heif decoder

scripts.dev-debug: npm run build-wasm-debug && cp build/debug/libheif.js build/debug/libheif.wasm src
scripts.dev-release: npm run build-wasm-release && cp build/release/libheif.js build/release/libheif.wasm src
scripts.build: npm run build-wasm-release && tsc && cp build/release/libheif.js build/release/libheif.wasm dist
scripts.build-es6: npm run build-wasm-release-es6 && tsc -p tsconfig.es6.json && cp build/release/libheif.js build/release/libheif.wasm dist
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run dev-debug && npm test && npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.demo: npm run build-es6 && cp dist/index.js dist/libheif.js dist/libheif.wasm demo

author: seven332
